price: Ditën, kur do t’i mbërthejmë ata me forcën më të madhe, Ne do të hakmerremi.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
